author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Lots of PlayStation news today. February's selection of PS Plus Essentials games have been revealed, headlined by Payday 3. Leadership at Sony is getting a shake-up, with a new Sony CEO announced, and the head of Sony Interactive being confirmed. And finally, for PC gamers who had a real issue signing up for a PlayStation account just to play PlayStation games, Sony is backing off of that a little bit. But PC players who are signed in to a PS account will get special incentives depending on the game they're playing.

And our thoughts are with the LA fire victims. Our Humble Bundle charity bundles support @DirectRelief, @WCKitchen, @SavetheChildren, @IMC_Worldwide & @BINCharity, providing medical aid, essential supplies, family support, meals & local business assistance. Help us make a difference during this challenging time. #LAFireRelief #HumbleBundle https://promo.humblebundle.com/lafirerelief
title: PS Plus Essentials for February Announced - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Check out gameplay from the Escape from Duckov Demo. Gameplay captured on PC

author: IGN
description:
The latest Marvel Animation's Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man teaser trailer shows villains, heroes, and more from this 10-episode animated series. Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man's voice cast includes Hudson Thames, Colman Domingo, Eugene Byrd, Grace Song, Zeno Robinson, Hugh Dancy and Charlie Cox. Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man is now streaming on Disney+.

The head writer of Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man is Jeff Trammell and Mel Zwyer is the supervising director. Brad Winderbaum, Kevin Feige, Louis D’Esposito, Dana Vasquez-Eberhardt and Trammell serve as executive producers.
title: Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man - Official Trailer (2025) Hudson Thames, Charlie Cox

author: IGN
description:
Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man reviewed by Joshua Yehl on Disney+

Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man is a marvelously good time. By swapping out Tony Stark as Peter Parker’s mentor and replacing him with Norman Osborn, we’re treated to 10 episodes of insidiously fun superhero TV. Given how it ends, it’s clear Marvel has a lot of juicy (and unexpected) new ideas they’re eager to explore in the second and third seasons Disney+ has already ordered. This is a truly fresh take on Spider-Man filled with many delightful surprises, from fun superhero cameos to shocking plot twists. The inclusion of real-world issues does give it an air of authenticity, although it’s essentially window dressing for a fun action show with great characters. And while the animation has some distracting quirks, overall, it works quite well. Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man has lively pacing, the writing is as sharp as a scorpion’s tail, and it finds new ways to make you laugh and gasp every episod
title: Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man Review - Spoiler-Free

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the latest RailGods of Hysterra trailer for the survival base-building Lovecraftian game developed by Troglobytes Games. Players will command a living train, craft weapons, and grow a mobile base to explore an ever-changing world. The latest trailer highlights what's possible with the building mechanics to forge a fortress like no other. RailGods of Hysterra is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#Gaming #Games #Trailer
title: RailGods of Hysterra - Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Calling an emergency meeting! Check out the latest Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble trailer for the reveal that The Crewmate from Among Us is now available as paid character DLC for the puzzle platformer game. Bananas will turn to pizza slices as players channel their inner Impostor through the game’s various stages and modes. Additionally, Super Monkey Ball Banana Rumble's free new 2.10 update is now live, bringing a new stage for the Ba-Boom battle mode, new customization options, and more.

#SuperMonkeyBall #AmongUs #Gaming

author: IGN
description:
Contraband Police, the game that puts you in the shoes of a border patrol agent watching out for smuggling, forgery, and corruption in the fictional communist country of Acaristan in 1983, is getting its first big expansion: Crimson Fall. This trailer is your first look. Crimson Fall will be released in Q4 2025 for Steam, Xbox Series X|S, and PS5. You can learn more and wishlist here if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3439880/Contraband_Police__Crimson_Fall

#IGN #Gaming
title: Contraband Police - Crimson Fall DLC Official Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Rift of the NecroDancer reviewed by Charlie Wacholz on PC, also available on Nintendo Switch.

You could wear out your keyboard slapping arrow keys to the beat and jamming in your seat to Rift of the NecroDancer’s excellent soundtrack, fervently chasing down a perfect run of a song for hours. Whether you're fighting stuffy puppet masters, rhythmically ridding the world of monsters, or just waddling around in a silly mole costume, it provides many excellent flavors of arcade-style rhythm action. Even though this “Greatest Hits” anthology isn’t as focused or Earth-shattering as Brace Yourself Games’ genre-bending debut album, it still continually surprises and delights by providing clever twists on time-tested mechanics.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Rift of the NecroDancer Review

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Demeo x Dungeons & Dragons: Battlemarked trailer, announcing the upcoming collaboration between Resolution Games and Wizards of the Coast. Use your might and magic to defeat foes alongside your friends in this new D&D game. Demeo x Dungeons & Dragons: Battlemarked is steeped in D&D lore while featuring a dungeon master-less system. With cross-platform support for up to four players it will launch with two campaigns, with more to follow in the future. Demeo x Dungeons & Dragons: Battlemarked will be available on PC, console, and XR devices.

#DungeonsAndDragons #Demeo #Gaming
title: Demeo x Dungeons & Dragons: Battlemarked - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Learn more about the grim world of Phantom Line and get another look at the terrifying threats you'll face in this new trailer for the upcoming co-op (1-4) shooter set in the post-nuclear European continent. Your mission is to search and contain anomalies – paranormal activity hidden from the public eye in an open-world map full of dynamic events. Phantom Line will be available on PC. A new playtest is available now on Discord.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Phantom Line - Official Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description:
It’s been more than a year since the release of Spider-Man 2, and Insomniac Games has added a bunch of new content to the Spider-Man game since then. With the release of the Marvel's Spider-Man 2 PC version coming at the end of the month, plus the news that there is no planned story DLC in the game’s future, we thought it would be a good time to look back at the dozens of new features, cosmetics and bug fixes that have been introduced to the game post-release. Here’s everything that’s been added to Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 since launch.

00:00 - Intro
00:34 - Spider-Man 2 Early Updates
01:24 - Spider-Man 2 Version 1.002, March 2024
03:02 - Spider-Man 2 Version 1.003, June 2024
04:17 - Spider-Man 2 Version 1.004, October 2024
05:10 - Spider-Man 2 PC (and DLC Update)

For help with boss fights, collectibles and easter eggs, check out our complete Spider-Man 2 wiki, complete with an interactive map!
https://www.ign.com/wikis/marvels-spider-man-2

#SpiderMan #Gaming #Marvel
title: Spider-Man 2 - Everything New Added Since Release

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Riff Raff trailer for this upcoming movie starring Jennifer Coolidge, Ed Harris, Gabrielle Union, Lewis Pullman, Miles J. Harvey, Emanuela Postacchini, Michael Angelo Corvino, with Pete Davidson, and Bill Murray.

Vincent is an ex-criminal who more than anything, just wants a normal, peaceful life. He and his wife Sandy have built a loving family with their son DJ and are spending the winter break in a cabin before he goes off to college. Chaos ensues when Vincent’s disowned son Rocco, his girlfriend Marina and Vincent’s ex-wife Ruth abruptly show up to spoil the festivities with an ominous warning: the famed gangsters Leftie and Lonnie are coming for them.

Riff Raff is written by John Pollono. 

Riff Raff, directed by Dito Montiel, opens in US theaters on February 28, 2025.

#Movies #Trailer #IGN
title: Riff Raff - Official Trailer (2025) Jennifer Coolidge, Bill Murray, Pete Davidson

author: IGN
description:
Watch the first 8-minutes of Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man in this clip for the new animated series distributed on Disney Plus. We get a taste of Peter Parker's day as a high school kid at Midtown High as a battle with Doctor Strange and a dimensional monster duke it out across campus.

Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man's voice cast includes Hudson Thames, Colman Domingo, Eugene Byrd, Grace Song, Zeno Robinson, Hugh Dancy, and Charlie Cox. Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man launches on Disney+ on January 29, 2025.

The head writer of Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man is Jeff Trammell and Mel Zwyer is the supervising director. Brad Winderbaum, Kevin Feige, Louis D’Esposito, Dana Vasquez-Eberhardt, and Trammell serve as executive producers.

#SpiderMan #Marvel #TV
title: Your Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man - Official Opening Clip (2025) Hudson Thames

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Announcement Trailer for Yasha: Legends of the Demon Blade, an isometric action roguelite game developed by 7QUARK. Players will become a master of the Demon Blades and combat swarms of demons in a fantasy realm set in the Edo period. Gather upgrade items and gourmet ingredients to unlock recipes, including fantastical ramen, for significant strength boosts. Yasha: Legends of the Demon Blade is launching on April 24 for PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Yasha: Legends of the Demon Blade - Official Announcement Trailer (English Subtitles)

author: IGN
description:
Tour creepy dark spaces, see terrifying enemies, and gameplay from M.O.Z.I. in this trailer for the upcoming story-driven first-person shooter with elements of horror, survival, and tower defense. M.O.Z.I. will be available on PC. You can wishlist the game on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2659040/MOZI/

In M.O.Z.I., you’ll escort a transport to one of the last human settlements, crossing dangerous, war-torn lands. You’ll need to gather food and batteries, fend off monsters, mutants, crazed humans, wild animals, and other threats. As you navigate this perilous journey and interact with your companion, you’ll uncover the mystery of your past and shape your future.

#IGN #Gaming
title: M.O.Z.I. - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
title: Is Superman's face CGI?

author: IGN
description:
Disasters won’t wait, will you? Get a deep dive into RoadCraft in this overview trailer for the upcoming construction simulation game. The new RoadCraft trailer shows what you can expect, including the 8 maps you can explore, your mission, and more.

In RoadCraft, take control of heavy machinery and rebuild industries in devastated regions. Experience advanced real-time physics as you manage resources, tackle challenges, and reshape the aftermath. You can also team up with up to 4 players in co-op to rebuild together.

#IGN #Gaming
title: RoadCraft - Official Gameplay Overview Trailer

description: Don't miss the Hatsune Miku Collaboration Trailer for Rocket League, a sports action car soccer game developed by Psyonix. Players can now play to complete challenges to earn Hatsune Miku-themed rewards such as car skins, trail effects, and more to enjoy. The Rocket League x Hatsune Miku event is available now through February 11.
